sys_hub_flow.name: 48hr before a meetup

sys_element_mapping.value:
Hi 2➛Meetup event Record➛Group➛Owner➛First name,

 

I hope you are getting excited about your Meetup!

 

Here are a few things to keep in mind before your event:

 

  • Make sure to record all of the event attendees in the Developer Meetup attendance app on the Check-in page.
  • If you can, try to take pictures from the event, that way you can post them to your Meetup.com chapter page.
  • When you request a reimbursement, please provide a detailed receipt and keep your expenses below $15/person per Meetup up to $500/quarter for your events. You can request a reimbursement through the attendance app.

 

Please let me know if you need anything from my end in the meantime and thank you for organizing this event for your chapter!

 

Best,

 1➛Group Record➛Default assignee➛Name

1➛Group Record➛Default assignee➛Title

servicenow
